item.title: Installing Hugo
item.description: This is a quick-start guide to setting up Hugo with GitHub pages, since it took too much effort to find the full instructions anywhere else. Install Hugo from the releases page. Run hugo new site blog to make the skeleton of your blog website. Install a theme you want. I just did cd themes and git clone https://github.com/spf13/hyde. More info about themes here. Update the config.toml generated from step 2 to use the theme.
